org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class SolutionColoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.SolutionColoring

  • public class SolutionColoring
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for coloring a game based on a solution. This class also writes winner information WINNER, and memoryless strategy (STRATEGY_SUCCESSORS and STRATEGY_TRANSITION) to states of the game.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String O_NONE_WINNING_REGION_COLOR
      The option of the color for the region where no player wins.
      static java.lang.String O_PLAYER0_WINNING_REGION_COLOR
      The option of the color for the winning region of player 0.
      static java.lang.String O_PLAYER1_WINNING_REGION_COLOR
      The option of the color for the winning region of player 1.
      static java.lang.String STRATEGY_SUCCESSORS
      The property of the successor of a state in its winning strategy.
      static java.lang.String STRATEGY_TRANSITION
      The property of the outgoing transition of a state in its winning strategy.
      static java.lang.String WINNER
      The property of the winner on a state.
